name: backend
description:
Create tables in the database: 
 CREATE TABLE users(     id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,     email VARCHAR(50),     username  VARCHAR(50) ,     surname VARCHAR(50) ); CREATE TYPE pstatus AS ENUM('active', 'inactive', 'declined', 'completed'); CREATE TABLE projects(     id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,     pname VARCHAR(50),     body TEXT,     stat pstatus,     assginer INT ); CREATE TABLE tasks(     id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,     pname VARCHAR(50),     pdescription TEXT,     score INT,     stat pstatus,     pid INT,     assignee integer[],     assginer INT );
